    Glossary

    Source → MGTOW

    AFC

    Average Frustrated Chump. (See Beta Male and Omega Male)

    Alpha Male

    The leader of the pack. The c~~~ of the walk. The man other men aspire to be… and women want to be with.

    NOTE: MGTOW do not subscribe to the abstractions “beta” or “alpha” because these terms are essentially defined by the female and are therefore unreliable terms define a “man”. These definitions exist here to illustrate what others mean, and – at most – may be useful to encapsulate certain male behaviors.
